ACTIONS.DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure, that you really want to 'delete'?

HOME.TITLE: Landingpage
HOME.TEXT:
Welcome to the Hetzner Cloud Mobile App

This is an inoffical app for the Hetzner Cloud. Using this app you can use alot features known of the Hetzner Cloud by your smartphone. You'll also get a overview for all your servers.

ABOUT.TITLE: About this App
ABOUT.TEXT: The developer of this App is Lukas Kämmerling. This App is in no way connected to the company "Hetzner Online GmbH", so unofficial. It only uses a webservice offered by the mentioned company. Only project, which you create by yourself are saved on the device. Using the delete feature in here they will be only deleted locally. The API tokens are only used to communicate with the Hetzner Cloud API, in no any other way.

DELETE_ALL.TITLE: Delete all data
DELETE_ALL.TEXT: You are sure you want to delete all data? If you want to use that app in future, you have to recreate all your projects.
DELETE_ALL.BUTTON: Yes, I want to delete all local app data.

AUTH.TITLE: Authentication
AUTH.NOT_AVAILABLE: Unfortunately there was no security authentication found on your device.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Hetzner Status - Settings
SETTINGS.TEXT: This app is able to send push notifications from Hetzner Status. You can select the categories for that.

DESCRIPTION.POWER:
„Shutdown“ sends a ACPI signal to the server. In our default setup your server will shut down gracefully.

„Power off“ powers your server off directly. This can cause data loss.

Please note, that server which are powered off are still billed. In our FAQ you can find more information about this.
DESCRIPTION.POWER_RESET: „Power Reset“ resets your server ungraceful. This can cause data loss.

DESCRIPTION.RESCUE_MODE: „After activating the rescue system your server will start automatically to it by network doing a restart. You can use the rescue system as long as you want, the activation for it will work for 60 minutes. After a reboot your server will start into your installed system.
DESCRIPTION.RESET_ROOT_PASSWORD: „Power Reset“ resets your server ungraceful. This can cause data loss..

DESCRIPTION.BACKUPS:
Backups are copies of your hard disk created automatically. Each server offers 7 slots for backups. If all slots are used, the oldest backup will be deleted. We suggest to shutdown the server if you're doing a manual backup, so that the data is completely consistent.

By activating backups a monthly fee of 20% of the server fee will be billed.
DESCRIPTION.SNAPSHOTS:
Snapshots are direct copies of the hard disk of your server.
You can create new server using this snapshot and you're able to move these snapshots to other projects.
We suggest to shutdown the server before creating a snapshot, so that the data is completely consistent.
Snapshots are billed 0.0119 €/GB/month (including german VAT of 19 %).
DESCRIPTION.REBUILD:
Doing a rebuild the server will be completely reinstalled by the choosen image.
All data will be destroyed!

ACTIONS.CREATE_BACKUP: Order backups for the mentioned monthly fee!
ACTIONS.CREATE_SNAPSHOT: Create snapshot for the mentioned monthly fee!

UPGRADE.TITLE: Server Upgrade
UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION:
Sie benötigen mehr Performance? Upgraden Sie Ihren Server. Ein Upgrade vergrössert das Dateisystem und die Disk Ihres Servers.

Es ist nicht möglich in einen Tarif mit kleinerer Disk zu wechseln.

Sie müssen Ihren Server ausschalten um ein Upgrade durchzuführen.

Ein Upgrade dauert typischerweise nur wenige Minuten.

ERRORS.REQUIRED_TYPE: Bitte geben Sie einen Typen an.
ERRORS.REQUIRED_SHUTDOWN: Der Server muss ausgeschaltet sein, damit ein Upgrade durchgeführt werden kann.
ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Leider gab es bei der Anfrage einen Fehler. Probieren Sie es bitte erneut.
